casebody.data:
Morgenthau et al., Appellants, v. Walker, Respondent. (City Court of New York, General Term. October 24, 1892.) Action by Henry Morgenthau and others against Elizabeth H. Walker. From judgment dismissing the complaint on the merits, entered on the report of Hon. Ernest Hall, referee, plaintiffs appeal.

Argued before Ehrlich, C. J., and Van Wyck and McCarthy, JJ.

Lachman, Morgenthau & Goldsmith, for appellants. Alex. Thain, for respondent. Ehrlich, C. J.

The judgment appealed from must be affirmed, with costs, on the opinion of the learned referee.
